name: BestFriendsPetResources
0:
”Alexa, ask Pet Resources how do I adopt a pet?”
”Alexa, ask Pet Resources how do I crate train a puppy?”
”Alexa, ask Pet Resources how can I get my cat to use the litter box?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pet resources
Developer Terms of Use
des: Best Friends Animal Society is the only national animal welfare organization dedicated to ending the killing of dogs and cats in America’s shelters. Our team of animal care experts have provided pet owners with all of the resources they need -- whether you're bringing home a pet today and integrating them into your family, solving common behavior issues, or finding new ways to grow the connection between you and your pet.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
